content.name: ssd
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about internal Flash-based Solid State Disks (SSDs, mSATAs) in the  storage system.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the SSD

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the SSD.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the SSD needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - SSD needs replacement.
  • false - SSD does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parentStorageProcessor
attributes.description: Parent storage processor of the ssd.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot where the SSD is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the SSD.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the SSD, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the SSD.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier for the SSD's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the SSD.
